entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 62 %

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
